desc: Metavo is an avocado-based natural supplement that helps stabilize blood glucose levels, curbs sugar cravings, and boosts fat metabolism. All our products are evidence-based, made in Canada and Health Canada approved. We use premium natural ingredients that have been scientifically proven to help you live your best.

layout.text: Take Control of Your Health, Naturally.
Help Balance Blood Sugars and Curb Sugar Cravings
